            <label for="age">What is your age?</label>

            <input type="number" id="age" name="age" required>

            

            <label for="sport">What is your favorite sport?</label>

            <input type="text" id="sport" name="sport" required>

            

            <button type="button" onclick="displayMessage()">Submit</button>

        </form>

        <div class="message" id="message"></div>

    <script>

        function displayMessage() {

            const name = document.getElementById('name').value;

            const age = document.getElementById('age').value;

            const sport = document.getElementById('sport').value;


            const messageDiv = document.getElementById('message');

            messageDiv.textContent = `Hi ${name}, you are ${age} years old and your favorite sport is ${sport}.`;

        }

    </script>
